topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54011b5763687232dc630000#post_54011b5763687232dc630000
[bq="PaskaNaakka"]The things people say when they aren't really thinking can be hilarious.

I was talking with my aunt who works with the homeless, and she was talking about how just shuffling them from shelter to shelter wasn't going to help; that there should be some kind of [spoiler]final solution to the homeless problem[/spoiler][/bq]
The most effective solution to homelessness is to prevent it in the first place.  Veterans vs non-veterans are homeless at a rate of 24 times than non-veterans; this can be prevented by fucking paying our troops and actually giving a shit about them instead of treating them like disposable garbage.
